subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace in Jaipur served as the official residence of the Maharaja?
question_hi: जयपुर में मैहाराजा के अधिकारी का स्वभावी है।
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal and Amer Fort are both popular tourist attractions in Jaipur, but Amer Fort served as the official residence of the Maharaja. Amer Fort is the chosen answer.
explanation_hi: हवा महाल और अमेर फोट जैसिंग के राजन के घर का एक बेल है। अमेर फोट जैसिंग राजन के घर के राजन के घर मैंचुरी
D_hi: अमेर फोट जैसिंग के घर मैंचुरी
explanation_en: Amer Fort served as the official residence of Maharaja Jai Singh. It was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II and is a popular tourist attraction in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: अमेर फोट जैसिंग के घर मैंचुरी
question_en: Which fort was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II and served as his official residence?
question_hi: अमेर फोट जैसिंग के घर मैंचुरी
D_hi: अमेर फोट जैसिंग के घर मैंचुरी
explanation_en: Amer Fort was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II and served as his official residence. It is also known as the Amer Fort and is a popular tourist attraction.
explanation_hi: अमेर फोट जैसिंग के घर मैंचुरी

explanation_en: Amer Fort was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II and served as his official residence. It is also known as the Amer Fort and attracts tourists from across the world.
